content: The way the cart s with fire will also differ. It will spin around while spewing fire from the front to try and get you. When this happens, stick close to it and spin with it. If you get caught with this move, throw on the Fireproof Mantle to negate some of the fire damage. Another variation you'll see is it spitting fireballs. For this move, it will aim the fireballs and spit them out, and you can dash out of the way to miss them entirely.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Cooling Slope' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Rusty-Gold Cart'.
The content is as follows:
The way the cart s with fire will also differ. It will spin around while spewing fire from the front to try and get you. When this happens, stick close to it and spin with it. If you get caught with this move, throw on the Fireproof Mantle to negate some of the fire damage. Another variation you'll see is it spitting fireballs. For this move, it will aim the fireballs and spit them out, and you can dash out of the way to miss them entirely.
